mapper.select: select * from eventmain order by mainid desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eventboard ( mainid, uid, username, content, creationdate, eval ) VALUES ( #{mainid}, #{uid}, #{username}, #{content}, now(), #{eval} );

INSERT INTO eventmain ( subject, description, time, location, img, creationdate, endflag, youtube, agefrom, ageto, insname, inscareer, fee, entrance, age, minentrance, skill, conditions, locdesc, img2, img3, insimg ) VALUES ( #{subject}, #{description}, #{time}, #{location}, #{img}, now(), 'N', #{youtube}, #{agefrom}, #{ageto}, #{insname}, #{inscareer}, #{fee}, #{entrance}, #{age}, #{minentrance}, #{skill}, #{conditions}, #{locdesc}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{insimg} )

INSERT INTO eventrequest ( name, emailaddr, age, reqrason, phone, creationdate, mainid, bankflag, confirm, password, agree ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{emailaddr}, #{age}, #{reqrason}, #{phone}, now(), #{mainid}, 'N', 'N', #{password}, #{agree} );
mapper.select: select e.*, ( select count(*) from eventrequest er where er.mainid = e.mainid ) as reqcount, ( select count(*) from eventboard eb where eb.mainid = e.mainid ) as boardcount from eventmain e order by time desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{startRowNum}
select e.*, ( select count(*) from eventrequest er where er.mainid = e.mainid ) as reqcount from eventmain e where mainid = #{param1}
